MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA5 postcode area of Mauchline. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.15am to repair a fault on the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.23am on Thursday 12th November 2020.
